body.p: The 3rd Edition FreeBSD Handbook will be published in two volumes, each over 400 pages. Volume I (User Guide) will cover the basics, while Volume II (Administrator's Guide) will cover system administration and more advanced topics.
If you would like to get involved with the production of this edition, please send email to the -doc mailing list. Thanks!

tr.td: Create new callout images for the numbers 1 - 25 as the default images with the DocBook stylesheets only go from 1-9 and then fall back on text numbers. This looks bad when we have more than 9 callouts in the text, such as the Security Advisories section of the Security chapter. Update: Numbers up to 15 added from DocBook CVS.
